Sentencas: Operational guidelines for safe and optimal load following operation of a residential solid oxide fuel cellcombined heat and power system are suggested.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: System layout design optimization via feasibility test and performance analysis is preceded.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: Then, the effect of system parameters on system performance is analyzed in a parametric study to draw an operating window and to derive optimal operating conditions.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: Owing to complete analytical expressions equipped in an in-house one-dimensional solid oxide fuel cell stack model, reliable estimation of the stack performance under various operating conditions is accomplished.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: The operating window is drawn from the feasibility criteria, which consider system thermal integration and durability.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: It is found that the operating range of low current density, low fuel utilization, and low air utilization values leads to unfeasible thermal integration.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: Moreover, the operating range of high current density, low fuel utilization, and high air utilization leads to defect in system durability.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: Finally, the optimal operating conditions are suggested to supply heat and power for extreme seasonal energy demands.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: The optimal operating condition for summer is suggested by the air utilization of 17.5%, the current density of 0.4 A/cm2, and the fuel utilization of 80%, providing the net electrical power of 18.5 kW, the electrical efficiency of 44.1%, and the heat to power ratio of 0.95.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: The optimal operating condition for winter is suggested by the air utilization of 17.5%, the current density of 0.3 A/
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design

Sentencas: cm2, and the fuel utilization of 60%, providing the net electrical power of 15.5 kW, the electrical efficiency of 37.0%, and the heat to power ratio of 1.23.
Titulo: Operational guidelines for a residential solid oxide fuel cell-combined heat and power system with an optimal system layout design
